content: these fingerless gloves form a circle shape around the thumb they are knitted without breaking the yarn so there are only two ends to weave in per mitt the pattern is written that the mitts can be adjusted to fit different hand sizes the circle shape shows best when using self striping yarn the pattern is available **in russian** too http //ru-knitting livejournal com/5020751 html 1 - thanks to purke 2 the **italian translation** was provided by maria rosa spighetti mariarosa72 3 it can be found here 4 a **german translation** was provided by liesl24 5 and can be found in this blog post 6 i also wrote a **version for aran weight yarn** see 4th picture and published it in this blog post 7 a **crochet version** of this pattern is also available on ravelry called kreisel fingerless gloves 8 november 24 2013 i published a new version of the pattern on the blog page 1 http //ru-knitting livejournal com/5020751 html 2 http //www ravelry com/people/purke 3 http //www ravelry com/people/mariarosa72 4 http //www blog filiandcolori com/download/circle_mitts_traduzione_italiano pdf 5 http //www ravelry com/people/liesl24 6 http //knitting-and-so-on blogspot chain/2014/05/circle-mitts-deutsch html 7 http //knitting-and-so-on blogspot chain/2014/10/circle-mitts-aran-weight-version html 8 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/kreisel-fingerless-gloves
